name: Life and Death (ThetaTauTau)
description:
This game was made during Ludum Dare 44, as a compo (solo in 48h)

Life and death is a platformer where you control two character.

The goal is to make the two character join.

Arrow keys for control.

There are 4 levels, plus a bonus 5th as an end screen.

Made with unity (game engine), inkscape (image editor), bosca ceoil (music generator), a microphone and audacity (sounds capture and edition).

Tested only with firefox on windows, but It should works in others platforms.
